Welcome toGrievance Redressal Portal GNDEC

A streamlined platform to address and resolve concerns of students and staff at Guru Nanak Dev Engineering College.

File GrievanceLoginTrack GrievanceSend Reminder

How It Works

Simple and Transparent Process

Our grievance redressal system ensures that your concerns are addressed promptly and effectively.

Submit Your Grievance

Fill out the grievance form with all necessary details and submit it through our portal.

Track Progress

Monitor the status of your grievance through your personalized dashboard.

Get Resolution

Receive updates and resolutions from the administration directly through the portal.

Types of Grievances

What Issues Can We Help With?

Our portal handles a wide range of concerns to ensure all students and staff receive appropriate support.

Academic Issues

Problems related to courses, grading, examinations, or academic policies

Infrastructure

Issues with classrooms, laboratories, hostel facilities, or other physical infrastructure

Administrative

Concerns about administrative processes, documentation, or staff responsiveness

Financial Matters

Issues related to fees, scholarships, refunds, or any financial transactions

Discrimination

Complaints related to discrimination based on gender, caste, religion, or any other basis

Harassment

Reports of any form of harassment, bullying, or ragging incidents

Testimonials

Success Stories

I had an issue with my lab equipment, and it was resolved within 3 days after filing my grievance. The system works great!

Manpreet Singh

3rd Year, CSE

The scholarship reimbursement was delayed for months. After reporting through the portal, it was processed within a week.

Anjali Sharma

2nd Year, ECE

Had a concern about attendance marking. The grievance portal made it easy to get my issue addressed by the right department.

Rahul Verma

4th Year, ME

Ready to get your concerns addressed?Submit your grievance today.

GNDEC Grievance Redressal Portal

A platform dedicated to addressing and resolving concerns of students and staff at Guru Nanak Dev Engineering College. We strive to provide a transparent and efficient system for grievance management.
